name: A Walk Outside
description:
A Game made during the Secret Santa Game Jam! (Its late but, oh well). 
I had a letter to help with making the game. I couldn't use all of the ideas but I think it turned out pretty alright for what it is. 

I tried to go for a bit of an outdoorsie feel. 

There's 84 coins, see if you can get them all without dying! (you'll need to restart from the main menu to retry again) 

Known problems: 
Enemy hitboxes are inconsistent
There is some jittering sometimes 
When the player falls down into a pit from very high up, the camera doesn't fallow in time to catch it. If you randomly die after falling, this is why.
